acids_bases.title: Stomach antacids
acids_bases.overlayText: Antacids neutralize excess stomach acid, raising pH and reducing irritation.

acids_bases.title: Pool and aquarium chemistry
acids_bases.overlayText: Keeping pH in a safe range protects skin/eyes and helps disinfectants work effectively.

area.title: Flooring a room
area.overlayText: Area helps estimate how much tile or carpet you need to cover a floor.

area.title: Painting a wall
area.overlayText: Surface area determines how much paint is needed for a wall or fence.

algebra_area_model.title: Box method for multiplication
algebra_area_model.overlayText: Area models help multiply large numbers by splitting into parts and adding partial products.

algebra_area_model.title: Designing layouts and budgets
algebra_area_model.overlayText: Breaking a big problem into smaller rectangles mirrors breaking a cost or layout into parts.

electric_circuits.title: House wiring
electric_circuits.overlayText: Homes use parallel circuits so devices can run independently at the same voltage.

electric_circuits.title: Phone chargers
electric_circuits.overlayText: Chargers regulate voltage and current to safely deliver power to batteries.

forces_motion.title: Seatbelts and inertia
forces_motion.overlayText: Seatbelts provide the force needed to change your motion during sudden stops.

forces_motion.title: Pushing a shopping cart
forces_motion.overlayText: More net force produces more acceleration; heavier carts accelerate less for the same push.

friction.title: Car braking on a wet road
friction.overlayText: Friction between tires and road is why cars can brake and turn without skidding—low friction increases stopping distance.

friction.title: Shoes gripping the ground
friction.overlayText: Shoe friction prevents slipping while walking or running, especially on smooth surfaces.

waves_sound.title: Musical instruments
waves_sound.overlayText: Instrument pitch changes with frequency; louder sound corresponds to larger amplitude.

waves_sound.title: Medical ultrasound
waves_sound.overlayText: Ultrasound uses high-frequency waves to create images inside the body.

density_buoyancy.title: Ships floating
density_buoyancy.overlayText: Ships float because average density (including air inside) is less than water; buoyancy balances weight.

density_buoyancy.title: Hot-air balloons
density_buoyancy.overlayText: Lower-density hot air creates an upward buoyant force, allowing balloons to rise.

energy.title: Roller coasters
energy.overlayText: Potential energy at the top converts to kinetic energy as the coaster speeds up downhill.

energy.title: Hydroelectric power
energy.overlayText: Water’s gravitational potential energy converts to electrical energy through turbines.

electric_fields_static.title: Static cling (clothes, balloons)
electric_fields_static.overlayText: Static electricity makes light objects stick after charges build up (like balloons on hair).

electric_fields_static.title: Lightning
electric_fields_static.overlayText: Charge separation in storm clouds can create huge electric fields that discharge as lightning.

electromagnetism.title: Power generators
electromagnetism.overlayText: Generators convert mechanical motion into electrical energy by changing magnetic flux through coils.

electromagnetism.title: Induction cooktops
electromagnetism.overlayText: Induction uses changing magnetic fields to create currents that heat cookware efficiently.

light_optics.title: Eyeglasses and contact lenses
light_optics.overlayText: Lenses bend (refract) light to focus images sharply on the retina.

light_optics.title: Camera lenses
light_optics.overlayText: Cameras use lenses to form focused images on a sensor, similar to how eyes focus on the retina.

chemistry_reactions.title: Combustion (fuel burning)
chemistry_reactions.overlayText: Balanced equations help predict how much oxygen is needed and how much CO₂ and H₂O are produced.

chemistry_reactions.title: Rusting of iron
chemistry_reactions.overlayText: Rust forms when iron reacts with oxygen and water; equations describe the transformation of matter.

solutions_concentration.title: Medical blood tests
solutions_concentration.overlayText: Labs estimate concentrations of substances by measuring light absorption and comparing to standards.

solutions_concentration.title: Water treatment
solutions_concentration.overlayText: Concentration calculations help set safe disinfectant and contaminant levels in drinking water.

gases.title: Car tires and pressure
gases.overlayText: Tire pressure changes with temperature; proper pressure improves safety and efficiency.

gases.title: Scuba diving
gases.overlayText: Divers must consider pressure changes with depth to avoid rapid expansion of gases.

fractions.title: Cooking and recipes
fractions.overlayText: Recipes use fractions for ingredient amounts; scaling recipes uses equivalent fractions and multiplication.

fractions.title: Construction measurements
fractions.overlayText: Rulers and tape measures often use fractional inches; accuracy depends on reading fractions correctly.

functions_graphing.title: Business growth charts
functions_graphing.overlayText: Graphs show trends like revenue over time; slope tells how fast something is changing.

functions_graphing.title: Motion tracking
functions_graphing.overlayText: Position–time graphs show motion; slope represents velocity (rate of change of position).

statistics.title: Class test scores
statistics.overlayText: Mean and median help summarize performance; variability shows how spread out scores are.

statistics.title: Weather data
statistics.overlayText: Average temperature and variability help describe climate patterns and unusual days.

climate_greenhouse.title: Earth’s surface warming
climate_greenhouse.overlayText: Greenhouse gases help keep Earth warm by trapping some outgoing infrared radiation.

climate_greenhouse.title: Greenhouses for plants
climate_greenhouse.overlayText: Real greenhouses stay warmer by reducing heat loss and trapping warm air and radiation.

springs_hookes.title: Car suspension
springs_hookes.overlayText: Springs and shock absorbers smooth bumps by storing and dissipating energy.

springs_hookes.title: Spring scales
springs_hookes.overlayText: A spring scale measures force by how much a spring stretches.

torque_balance.title: Seesaws
torque_balance.overlayText: A seesaw balances when torques on both sides match; moving farther from the pivot increases torque.

torque_balance.title: Wrenches and door handles
torque_balance.overlayText: Longer handles produce more torque, making it easier to loosen bolts or open heavy doors.

gravity_orbits.title: Satellites and GPS
gravity_orbits.overlayText: Satellites stay in orbit when forward speed and gravity balance to provide centripetal acceleration.

gravity_orbits.title: Planetary motion
gravity_orbits.overlayText: Planets orbit stars due to gravity; orbital period depends on distance and central mass.

diffusion.title: Perfume spreading in a room
diffusion.overlayText: Odor molecules diffuse through air from high concentration near the source to lower concentration elsewhere.

diffusion.title: Oxygen exchange in lungs
diffusion.overlayText: Oxygen diffuses from alveoli into blood due to concentration gradients.

quantum_radiation.title: Infrared cameras
quantum_radiation.overlayText: Thermal cameras detect infrared radiation emitted by warm objects.

quantum_radiation.title: Stars and color
quantum_radiation.overlayText: Hotter stars peak at shorter wavelengths (bluer); cooler stars peak at longer wavelengths (redder).

general_science.title: Engineering prototypes
general_science.overlayText: Simulations help test ideas quickly before building real prototypes.

general_science.title: Science experiments
general_science.overlayText: Controlling variables is key to understanding cause and effect in experiments.
